title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Colin's Week 11 Reaction, Matt Mosley on Cowboys and Dak's Flat Chiefs L
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Colin's Week 11 Reaction, Matt Mosley on Cowboys and Dak's Flat Chiefs L
description:
Colin discusses why Sunday’s NFL games were so bizarre (3:00), the two most impressive teams these past few weeks (6:00), why Kirk Cousins reminds Colin of the housing market (5:00), why the Colts and Carson Wentz have quieted the doubters, and then he offers up some empathy for Baker Mayfield (11:00). Then, longtime Dallas Cowboys writer - and host of The Doomsday Podcast - Matt Mosley joins Colin all the way from Paris to discuss how Dak’s weaknesses got exposed in the loss to the Chiefs (13:00), how much the Cowboys’ injuries excuse Dak’s struggles (15:00), why Kliff Kingsbury and the Cardinals are having a breakout year (32:00), if OC Kellen Moore will will move on in the offseason (36:00) , and if the Eagles are becoming a real threat to the Cowboys (39:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
